English: to tell; to lay a plaint

Qieyun: 泥開一泰去?, 泥開一歌去?
English: a remedy; a resource. but; unfortunately
there is no resource; there being no alternative

Qieyun: 心開四青平?, 心開四青上?, 心開四青去?
English: to become sober; to wake up
a trick; to play a trick
to tolerate; to be lenient; paternal aunt. meanwhile; for the time being

Qieyun: 見開四蕭上?, 章開三陽入?, 匣開二耕入?

English: to grasp; to seize. to collect; to bring together
